attributes.action: Get Primark to restock 'The Walking Dead' t-shirts people deemed offensive.
attributes.background: Primark have removed 'The Walking Dead' t-shirts from their shelves, after they were deemed 'offensive' by certain individuals. These t-shirts contain a nursery rhyme, which is linked to a pivotal episode of the series. Sign this petition to get Primark to reconsider their decision.
